video.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
video.synopsis: Jack and his family traverse the globe, engaging experts in remote jungles, deserts, oceans and forests to share rare and exciting animal stories.

episodes.synopsis: In Montana, wildlife experts must deal with a bear that raided a family's farmhouse. Jack captures amazing wild animal behavior on remote camera.
episodes.title: A Grizzly Encounter

episodes.synopsis: At home in Bigfork, Montana, Jack gives a tour of his farm, joins in campfire songs with neighbors and visits a ranch filled with indigenous species.
episodes.title: Montana Hanna’s

episodes.synopsis: A Malaysian elephant conservation center is where Jungle Jack Hanna lends a helping hand to save as many of this endangered Asian species as possible.
episodes.title: Asian Elephant Adventure

episodes.synopsis: In Malaysia, Jack gets too close for comfort with a group of crocodiles, then comes face-to-face with a King Cobra on a hike in Kuala Lampur.
episodes.title: Crocs, Snakes & Caves

episodes.synopsis: Jack visits Africa's Knysna Elephant Park and Cheetah Outreach Center to learn how Earth's largest land mammal and fastest cat are threatened by man.
episodes.title: Race for Survival

episodes.synopsis: Join Jack at South Africa's Sanbona Wildlife Reserve, an arid environment and the only place on Earth where white lions can roam free.
episodes.title: Pride of Sanbona

episodes.synopsis: Jungle Jack heads to the famous Shamwari Game Reserve in South Africa for some up-close and personal encounters with elephants, rhino and lions.
episodes.title: Africa’s Big Five

episodes.synopsis: Jack tours former farming land in South Africa that's been transformed into a thriving ecosystem teaming with hippos, cheetah and other wildlife.
episodes.title: Shamwari: Soul of the Earth

episodes.synopsis: Join Jack and Sue in Cape Town, where the big city and wildlife collide -- from a baboon traffic jam to sharing the beach with a colony of penguins.
episodes.title: The Cape of Good Hope

episodes.synopsis: A hunting cheetah trio, a pride of lions and a family of cliff-dwelling baboons welcome the Hannas to South Africa's Sanbona Wildlife Reserve.
episodes.title: Sanbona Wildlife Reserve

episodes.synopsis: The dedicated veterinarians and anti-poaching experts at Shamwari reserve show Jack the techniques and technology protecting animals from poachers.
episodes.title: Shamwari’s Wild Vets

episodes.synopsis: Home to condors and guanacos, Patagonia's Andes Mountains are where Jack and Sue experience gorgeous glaciers and get a taste of the cowboy life.
episodes.title: Wild Patagonia

episodes.synopsis: Jack discovers which animal and plant life is capable of surviving the driest climate on Earth: Chile's extremely arid but beautiful Atacama desert.
episodes.title: Extreme Atacama

episodes.synopsis: Deep in the Peruvian Amazon, the Hanna family helps a group of conservationists with efforts rehabilitating monkeys, macaws, tapirs and other animals.
episodes.title: Amazon Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Jungle Jack travels to Chile's southern tip, where he boards a boat bound for Magdalena island -- home to a huge colony of breeding penguins.
episodes.title: Penguins of Magdalena Island

episodes.synopsis: Sunny California's quaint Danish town of Solvang welcomes Jack and Julie as they explore a rescue center for pigs and meet a famous horse trainer.
episodes.title: Galloping into Solvang

episodes.synopsis: At Zimbabwe's Hwange National Park, the Hannas get a rare view of elephants and learn the effects of drought on the park's pachyderm population.
episodes.title: Elephants of Zimbabwe

episodes.synopsis: Join Jack in Zambia as he takes a kayak to greet some of the Zambezi River's occupants, then strolls among lions and cheetah on a walking safari.
episodes.title: Zambezi: River of Life

episodes.synopsis: The worlds largest waterfall is neighbor to a home for orphaned elephants, where Jack helps place a tracking collar on a female about to be released.
episodes.title: Elephant Camp

episodes.synopsis: Jack heads to Botswana and Earth's largest inland delta to watch how a community of crocodiles, hippos and elephants thrive in their lush home.
episodes.title: Okavango Delta

episodes.synopsis: Hwange National Park is Jack's choice for a lion-tracking expedition, a search for the elusive African wild dog and a Devil's Pool diving excursion.
episodes.title: Zimbabwe: Cats and Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Jack visits takin, white rhino, wild dogs and other animals from around the globe who make their home at an Ohio, U.S. safari park called The Wilds.
episodes.title: The Wilds

episodes.synopsis: Endangered Panamanian Gold Frogs and other rare amphibians are the focus of Jack's trip to a volcanic valley, where he also visits a cacao plantation.
episodes.title: Exploring El Valle

episodes.synopsis: A population of Caribbean bats draws the Hanna family to Panama. They check out the flying mammals, plus other cave-dwelling creatures.
episodes.title: Braving Bocas

episodes.synopsis: Jungle Jack Hanna leaves dry land to take a ride with bottle-nosed dolphins and learn how these clever creatures are helpful to children in need.
episodes.title: Dolphins of Curacao

episodes.synopsis: Jack takes a front-line look at the growing threat of rhino poaching and talks with conservationists who battle to save the extant species.
episodes.title: Horn of Hope
